document_data.caption: A map showing the major islands of the Genie's Turban within the Corsair Domains.
document_data.name: Genie's Turban
document_data.mainbody: The '''Genie's Turban''' was a group of islands [[Northwest Zakhara|off the coast]] from [[Muluk]] in [[Zakhara]].

Description.Island of the Firethorns: This island was so named for the abundance of [[firethorn]], or "sea rose" plants that covered the land. Only two settlements were found on the islandâ€”a small fishing village called [[Safe Cove]], and the city of [[Hawa]].
Description.Island of the Gardens: The Island of Gardens was falsely named in a manner of speaking. Blocked from view by the sea, the arid interior of this island was surrounded by lush, beautiful vegetation. This islands' villages were located near the coast or along the eastern area of forested elevation called the Comb.

document_data.Inhabitants: The area of the Genie's Turban was entirely peopled with corsairs. Naturally suspicious, they would often test newcomers to see if they were confused by the use of the term for the Beauty Marks islets.
